value:
It is my sworn duty to protect Lady
Lyndis, daughter of Lady Madelyn,
granddaughter of Marquess Caelin.

The Lycian League is a collection of
noble houses who have agreed to a
policy of mutual defense.$k$pHouse Caelin is one such house.

I still have much to learn of what
is expected of a knight in Askr...

It is a knight's duty to follow
the orders he is given. I truly
believe that.

Sain is hopeless... If he doesn't start
taking battle more seriously, he'll find
himself on the wrong end of a blade.

I am Kent of Caelin. I have been sent,
for reasons unknown, to deliver this
from $Nf.

Blades cry out for those destined
to wield them. I want to be a knight
worthy of such a calling.
My happiness is to serve.
This is a problem indeed.

I will strive to live up to what is
expected of me, as is my duty to
you—and to Lady Lyndis as well.

I am Kent, knight of Caelin. I believe
this is our first meeting... Let us ride
on to victory, shall we!

I am a knight of Caelin. I view Lady
Lyndis as my liege, and it is my
happiness to serve her.$k$pI am sure that you're aware, but Lady
Lyndis is wise, kind, beautiful, and
strong. And I would be remiss to le—$k$p...Excuse my rambling. Lady Lyndis
aside, there is something I've been
meaning to ask you...$k$pWhat are you planning to do once
the fighting here is through?$k$pCaelin would be sure to welcome
someone as strong as you. You could
be a knight—or a tactician perhaps.$k$pI'll leave you to think it over...$k$pI imagine there are many worlds that
would be eager to have you, but...
I do hope you'll consider mine.
はっ
たあっ！
ぐっ
不覚…！
For my liege!
I will break through.
Consider it done.
Words won't save you!
Lady Lyndis...
Haha!
I am Kent. Let us fight together and ride on to victory!
Hm? Is that a game in this world? Poking knights?
Lady Lyndis is wise, kind, beautiful, and strong. She is honorable, and... Well, you see my point.
My happiness is to serve Lady Lyndis.
Sain is almost more trouble than he's worth. But I know that I can rely on him.
I have so long believed that a knight owed blind obedience to his lord... How do I know what my loyalty truly requires of me?
Would you like to join the Caelin knights? As Knight Commander, I would welcome you to our ranks.
Leave it to me.
I see.
I am at your command.
